title: Fix you're shit riot
body:
First of all why do i get a 20 min low priority queue after 1 game because my game won't start in a ranked match, waited 20 min not starting up, the i restart the game and im not allowed to reconnect. 
Fix you're shit riot, and stop calling it low priority queue when u can't even join a match, it's just a polite way of saying leaverbuster!
And don't give me that "oh just watch tv for 20 min, it's not that big of a deal" looking at u Riot Tantram (NA), just shut your mouth pls
and why did it just add 10 min half way through the queue, making me wait 30 min when u say max 20 min.
AND WHY THE FUCK IS IT STUCK? https://gyazo.com/28df782f7583d1b86b23451daf266463
Then making me wait 20 min extra! i aint waiting an 1 hour to play this game

replies.body: That is a pretty damn high queue, I can understand the frustration.  It might be best to stick to custom games until this gets resolved, otherwise your queue is going to keep escalating.  Even though your intention is not to disconnect or leave, it's still causing others a negative experience.  Your best bet now would be to use this time to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix whatever is causing your network to struggle while reaching the game server.

Also it's not gonna keep escalating, it just started at 20 min and then mid queue decided it would be a good idea to add 11 min to the queue.
Worst of it all was that then got stuck on 31:30 so we had to cancel the queue to play, annoying having to queue for an hour just to play a game.
Thank you for trying to help, but it was a one time thing but it's something that could happen again and i don't wanna play if theres a risk of getting penalized for it.

Also thanks for being the first customer support thingy thing out of the 1 million support people i talked to, to actually help me.

Thanks
